title: Great location good hotel
text:
Visited paramount hotel at the beginning of March 2017, got a terrific deal for flights and hotel from British Airways, the deal was so good that to be honest I wasn't expecting too much from the hotel but wasn't overly concerned as it's new york and didn't plan on spending much time in the hotel it was more just a place to sleep, so as long as it was comfortable enough I would have been happy.
On arrival we were pleasantly surprised upon entering the hotel lounge/check in area, it was stunning, check in was as smooth as could be and staff were very helpful, so far so good I thought, but I reserved judgement until we got to our room.
Upon entry to our room again I was pleasantly surprised, it was nice, happy days! Big comfy bed, quite modern and bathroom was modern and clean. Minor negatives about the room it was quite small/compact and the shower wasn't the most powerful.
For our 5 days in new york this was the perfect base for us, it is a 30sec walk to the centre of time square. Got a decent nights sleep every night, check out was easy and the hotel staff were very helpful organising our transfer to the airport and kept our bags for the day until it was time to leave.
Would definitely recommend paramount to anyone visiting new york.
